General.Name: Onyx Healthcare Inc.
General.Description: Onyx Healthcare Inc., a professional medical IT company, engages in the design, manufacturing, and trading of medical computers and peripherals for hospital/clinical IT market in Taiwan. The company offers AI ready medical PC and tablet, medical PC and monitor for digital OR, telemedicine, medical cart computer, medical power panel PC, power bank, battery management system, mobile medical tablet, professional and slim medical all in one PC, medical display and computer for medical devices, powerful medical all in one PC, motherboard, and industrial PC and tablet products, as well as healthcare infotainment all in one computer products. It also provides ODM/OEM services. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Onyx Healthcare Inc. operates as a subsidiary of AAEON Technology Inc.
